channel.title: Rep
channel.description:
im very sorry for posting this (i know it spam and off topic and he ofter things)
rep where has it gone
is this true
cm`s are only aloud to rep u and u can rep till u got 15 rep
and billysmither had like 83 rep and he now got none
wtf is this all about[br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2006, 10:17:06 AM[/size][hr]anyone[br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2006, 10:19:43 AM[/size][hr]its out coz i had 31 rep and its all gone
who is on my side here?

item.title: Rep
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

You should have checked Moparisthebest.com’s forums it says it there.

Read full topic

item.title: Rep
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“bobbymoore64”]im very sorry for posting this (i know it spam and off topic and he ofter things)

rep where has it gone

is this true

cm`s are only aloud to rep u and u can rep till u got 15 rep

and billysmither had like 83 rep and he now got none

wtf is this all about[/quote]

this was because low level people were repping everyone they could find basicaly. Thats why it was disabled because people were getting so much rep from people. I like the new method because it stops this and some people can still rep. This makes it so no one gets 100 rep from making 5 tuts that everyone who has over 20 post likes and decides to give you rep…

Note: I dont like talking about rep but he asked and i answered him

Read full topic
